settlements.title: Settlements
settlements.milestone: Over a billion dollars recovered for clients in settlements and verdicts.

compensation_message:
Injured in an Uber or Rideshare Accident?
Here's What You Need to Know

urgent_cases.intro: With the growing popularity of rideshare services like Uber, accidents involving their drivers have also increased. Whether you were a passenger, another driver, or a pedestrian, navigating the legal aftermath of an Uber accident can be complex. Mendez & Sanchez, APC has experience handling Uber-related injury claims and will fight to ensure you receive full compensation — even when multiple insurance layers or independent contractors are involved.

why_choose_us.title: How It Works
points: Get a Free Consultation 24/7 - Speak directly with an experienced Uber accident lawyer.
We Review Your Case - We'll explain your rights and outline every step — no legal jargon, just clear answers.
Get Paid, Get Justice - You get connected to top medical care and we fight for your maximum compensation.

what_we_handle.title: What We Do For You
points: No Money Upfront - You pay nothing unless we win your case.
Access to Top Medical Care - We connect you with leading doctors — no insurance or upfront cost required.
Maximum Compensation - We pursue the highest settlement possible from Uber's multi-tier insurance policies.
Discreet Representation - Your case is handled with privacy, professionalism, and respect.
Cash Advance - Need help now? We help qualified clients access funds before the case resolves.
We Come to You - Can't travel due to injuries? We'll meet you wherever is convenient.

what_you_need_to_know.title: What you need to know right now

questions.title: What Does Uber's $1M Insurance Cover?
questions.content: We expertly navigate Uber's $1 million liability insurance to ensure you receive full benefits for injuries and property damage. Our attorneys enforce Uber's responsibility during rides to help you get the maximum settlement.

questions.title: Who's Liable in an Uber Accident?
questions.content: We pursue all liable parties, including Uber and the at-fault driver. Our team fights for full compensation—medical bills, lost wages, pain and suffering, and more.

questions.title: What Are Uber's Driver and Vehicle Rules?
questions.content: We verify if Uber drivers and vehicles met legal requirements at the time of your accident. This strengthens your injury claim and helps us hold Uber and negligent drivers accountable.

questions.title: How Are Uber Accident Claims Different?
questions.content: Uber accident claims involve unique insurance policies and liability issues. We specialize in overcoming these complexities to get you justice and full financial recovery.

questions.title: What to Do After an Uber Accident?
questions.content:
• Get medical help and preserve evidence.
  • We handle insurance and police communications.
  • Our free case review outlines how to maximize your compensation.

questions.title: How Do Contingency Fees Work?
questions.content: We charge no fees unless we win. You can pursue your Uber accident claim risk-free, knowing our attorneys are committed to getting the best result.

questions.title: Is There Coverage If the Uber App Was On, No Ride Accepted?
questions.content: We investigate whether Uber's limited insurance or personal policies apply when the app is on but no ride is accepted—ensuring you still get compensation for your injuries.

metadata.title: Uber Accident Lawyers – Get the Compensation You Deserve
metadata.description: Injured in an Uber accident? Mendez & Sanchez, APC provides trusted legal representation for rideshare injury victims. Free consultations. No fees unless we win.
